name: Chess
premise: Two players command a medieval army in a strategic battle to capture the opponent's king.

session_playtime_notes: Game duration can vary greatly depending on the players' level of skill.
immersiveness_level_notes: While the game's theme is not very strong, the strategic depth can be highly engaging.
